However, you will be responsible to pay us for any cover provided and any fees incurred. If it’s easier, you can phone us on 0345 076 7646* or email us at home.services@sse.com.
Cancelling your Direct Debit without contacting us will not mean you have cancelled your cover with us.
Depending on the product(s) you've chosen, we'll contact you shortly to arrange the visit for your initial inspection and annual service.
In the meantime, if you would like any further information, you can visit our website or you can contact us online.
Thank you again for choosing to protect your home with SSE Home Services.
Kind regards
